description: 向左滑动到达屏幕边缘后，超过一定距离时触发加载，常用于横划展示少量的元素，滑动到底后跳转至另外界面的场景

descriptionTags.en: After swiping to the left to reach the edge of the screen, the loading is triggered when the distance exceeds a certain distance. It is often used to display a small number of elements horizontally, and then jump to another interface after swiping to the end.
descriptionTags.name: 左滑加载

tags.en: Custom classname

disabled.description:
是否禁用组件
@en whether to be disabled
disabled.name: disabled

tags.en: whether to be disabled

maxElementOffset.description:
页面元素允许划动的最大距离
@en The maximum distance the page element is allowed to swipe
maxElementOffset.name: maxElementOffset

tags.en: The maximum distance the page element is allowed to swipe

maxElementOffset.descWithTags: 页面元素允许划动的最大距离

maxLabelOffset.description:
label移动的最大距离
@en The maximum distance the label moves
maxLabelOffset.name: maxLabelOffset

tags.en: The maximum distance the label moves

minConfirmOffset.description:
页面允许触发的临界值(通常小于maxLabelOffset)
@en The threshold value at which the page is allowed to trigger (usually less than maxLabelOffset)
minConfirmOffset.name: minConfirmOffset

tags.en: The threshold value at which the page is allowed to trigger (usually less than maxLabelOffset)

minConfirmOffset.descWithTags: 页面允许触发的临界值(通常小于maxLabelOffset)

onConfirm.description:
释放触发的函数(跳转，加载等)
@en Callback when releasing(jump, load, etc.)
onConfirm.name: onConfirm

tags.en: Callback when releasing(jump, load, etc.)

onConfirm.descWithTags: 释放触发的函数(跳转，加载等)

circleSize.description:
圆形的直径
@en Diameter of circle
circleSize.name: circleSize

tags.en: Diameter of circle

labelAnimationDuration.description:
恢复动效时长(ms)
@en Resume animation duration (ms)
labelAnimationDuration.name: labelAnimationDuration

tags.en: Resume animation duration (ms)

labelAnimationFunction.description:
恢复动效函数
@en Resume animation function (ms)
labelAnimationFunction.name: labelAnimationFunction

tags.en: Resume animation function (ms)

damping.description:
阻尼动效参数，使用函数x = X/(aX+b)，其中X代表当前滑动距离，传入的值代表[a, b]
@en Damping animation parameter, use the function x = X/(aX+b), where X represents the current sliding distance, and the incoming value represents [a, b]
damping.name: damping

tags.en: Damping animation parameter, use the function x = X/(aX+b), where X represents the current sliding distance, and the incoming value represents [a, b]

damping.descWithTags: 阻尼动效参数，使用函数x = X/(aX+b)，其中X代表当前滑动距离，传入的值代表[a, b]

getScrollContainer.description:
得到滚动容器
@en Scroll container
getScrollContainer.name: getScrollContainer

tags.en: Scroll container

normalText.name: normalText

tags.en: Label initial text

activeText.name: activeText

tags.en: Text when triggering jump

bounceWhenBumpBoundary.description:
触碰左侧边界时是否需要回弹效果
@en Whether a bounce effect is required when touching the left boundary
bounceWhenBumpBoundary.name: bounceWhenBumpBoundary

tags.en: Whether a bounce effect is required when touching the left boundary

bounceWhenBumpBoundary.descWithTags: 触碰左侧边界时是否需要回弹效果

bounceDampRate.description:
当开启回弹效果时的阻尼系数
@en Damping coefficient when the rebound effect is turned on
bounceDampRate.name: bounceDampRate

tags.en: Damping coefficient when the rebound effect is turned on

bounceDampRate.descWithTags: 当开启回弹效果时的阻尼系数

bounceAnimateDuration.description:
当开启回弹效果时的动画毫秒时间
@en Animation in milliseconds when the bounce effect is turned on
bounceAnimateDuration.name: bounceAnimateDuration

tags.en: Animation in milliseconds when the bounce effect is turned on

bounceAnimateDuration.descWithTags: 当开启回弹效果时的动画毫秒时间

getBounceContainer.description:
回弹效果开启时需要回弹的容器，默认为 getScrollContainer 返回的容器或容器的一个子元素
@en The container that needs to be rebounded when the rebound effect is enabled, the default is the container returned by getScrollContainer or a child element of the container
getBounceContainer.name: getBounceContainer

tags.en: The container that needs to be rebounded when the rebound effect is enabled, the default is the container returned by getScrollContainer or a child element of the container

getBounceContainer.descWithTags: 回弹效果开启时需要回弹的容器，默认为 getScrollContainer 返回的容器或容器的一个子元素

bounceDistanceProcessor.description:
当开启回弹效果时自定义手指滑动跟手的距离计算方式，dis表示touchmove的距离
@en When the rebound effect is turned on, customize the calculation method of the distance between the finger sliding and the hand, and dis indicates the distance of touchmove
bounceDistanceProcessor.name: bounceDistanceProcessor

tags.en: When the rebound effect is turned on, customize the calculation method of the distance between the finger sliding and the hand, and dis indicates the distance of touchmove

bounceDistanceProcessor.descWithTags: 当开启回弹效果时自定义手指滑动跟手的距离计算方式，dis表示touchmove的距离

onTouchStart.description:
抛出外层touch事件，便于自定义，常用于阻止划动退出，切换tab等手势冲突
@en Throw the outer touchstart event, which is easy to customize. It is often used to prevent gesture conflicts such as swiping to exit, switching tabs, etc.
onTouchStart.name: onTouchStart

tags.en: Throw the outer touchstart event, which is easy to customize. It is often used to prevent gesture conflicts such as swiping to exit, switching tabs, etc.

onTouchStart.descWithTags: 抛出外层touch事件，便于自定义，常用于阻止划动退出，切换tab等手势冲突

onTouchMove.description:
抛出外层touch事件，便于自定义，常用于阻止划动退出，切换tab等手势冲突
@en Throws the outer touchmove event, which is easy to customize. It is often used to prevent gesture conflicts such as swiping to exit, switching tabs, etc.
onTouchMove.name: onTouchMove

tags.en: Throws the outer touchmove event, which is easy to customize. It is often used to prevent gesture conflicts such as swiping to exit, switching tabs, etc.

onTouchMove.descWithTags: 抛出外层touch事件，便于自定义，常用于阻止划动退出，切换tab等手势冲突

onTouchEnd.description:
抛出外层touch事件，便于自定义，常用于阻止划动退出，切换tab等手势冲突
@en Throws the outer touchend event, which is easy to customize. It is often used to prevent gesture conflicts such as swiping to exit, switching tabs, etc.
onTouchEnd.name: onTouchEnd

tags.en: Throws the outer touchend event, which is easy to customize. It is often used to prevent gesture conflicts such as swiping to exit, switching tabs, etc.

onTouchEnd.descWithTags: 抛出外层touch事件，便于自定义，常用于阻止划动退出，切换tab等手势冲突

onTouchCancel.description:
抛出外层touch事件，便于自定义，常用于阻止划动退出，切换tab等手势冲突
@en Throws the outer touchcancel event, which is easy to customize. It is often used to prevent gesture conflicts such as swiping to exit, switching tabs, etc.
onTouchCancel.name: onTouchCancel

tags.en: Throws the outer touchcancel event, which is easy to customize. It is often used to prevent gesture conflicts such as swiping to exit, switching tabs, etc.
